title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Instant Super Bowl Reaction and Aqib Talib on Cooper Kupp's Clinic, Controversial Calls, Donald Retirement Rumors
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Instant Super Bowl Reaction and Aqib Talib on Cooper Kupp's Clinic, Controversial Calls, Donald Retirement Rumors
description:
Colin reacts to the Matt Stafford and the Rams taking out the Bengals, and if he's buying all the Rams retirement talk leading up to the game (3:00), Then, Super Bowl Champ - and host of Catchin' Fades - Aqib Talib and Colin discuss why Cooper Kupp was able to dominate despite being the sole focus of the Cincy D (12:00), if the late defensive holding call against the Bengals was justified (13:00), how Joe Burrow was most effective (15:00), what surprised them about the Bengals defensive front (20:00), if Sean McVay stuck with his anemic run game for too long (21:00), if Stafford finally proved he's one of the top clutch QB's (23:00), if there's any truth to Aaron Donald (24:00) and Sean McVay (26:00) retirement rumors, why Aqib has so much respect for McVay as a coach (27:00), and how Jalen Ramsey can bounce back from his rough night (29:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
